summary: Woman inherits a traveling circus which brings financial difficulties.
cast: Joe Cook|Louise Fazenda|Joan Peers|William Collier Jr.|Tom Howard|Dave Chasen|Alan Roscoe|Adolph Milar|Clarence Muse|Nella Walker|Edward Martindel|Nora Lane|Tyrell Davis|Charles Gemora|Dannie Mac Grant|Ethel Loreen Greer|James J. Jeffries|Rolfe Sedan
director: Director: Frank Capra (as Frank R. Capra)
title: Pasa el circo
